text: Jo log yeh bohtan (slander) ghadh laye hain woh tumhare hi andar ka ek tola hain. Is waqiye ko apne haqq mein sharr na samajho balke yeh bhi tumhare liye khair hi hai. Jisne is mein jitna hissa liya usne utna hi gunaah sametha aur jis shaks ne iski zimmedari ka bada hissa apne sar liya uske liye to azaab e azeem hai
